title: Code quality audit and improvements
description:
Audit codebase for quality issues:
- Add error wrapping with context
- Improve test coverage (currently 48%)
- Add golangci-lint configuration
- Document public APIs
- Check for unused code
- Validate error handling patterns
notes: Started audit: Added golangci-lint config. Current stats: 6229 LOC, 48% test coverage, 17 uses of %w error wrapping, 98 error checks. No production panics.
